welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bristol, a vibrant city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and thriving cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Bella's
restaurants.description: Bella's is a italian restaurant located in Bristol.

restaurants.name: Buffalo Wild Wings
restaurants.description: Buffalo Wild Wings is a wings joint located in Bristol.

restaurants.name: Texas Roadhouse
restaurants.description: Texas Roadhouse is a steakhouse located in Bristol.

restaurants.name: Zaxby's
restaurants.description: Zaxby's is a fried chicken joint located in Bristol.

restaurants.name: Hardee's
restaurants.description: Hardee's is a fast food restaurant located in Bristol.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Bristol Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport caters to military personnel and their families, providing specialized services and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's WiFi network for free. A password can be obtained from the information desk.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
